english.segment1: I was on my way. To be with you today. well you know it's true. Because I wouldn't lie to you
english.segment2: First my car broke down. So then I had to hitch a ride. I was almost there. When the motor died
english.segment3: Don't hate me forever. I'm better late than never. I failed you. I'm sorry. That's simply my life story
english.segment4: I know it's much too late. To take you on a date. I know that it's no use. But this is my excuse
english.segment5: I was in a plane. And it was falling from the sky. I knew I had to survive. So I could say goodbye
english.segment6: You change your mind. Like I change the time. That I was gonna call you. Or say I was about to. You change your mind. Like I change the time. I said that I would be there. But then I didn't have a thing to wear
